Francois Le Droff's feed en-gb Sun, 17 Jan 2016 00:46:43 +0100 Sun, 17 Jan 2016 00:46:43 +0100
on line 12, column 28 in feed.ftl Left side index of range out of bounds, is 0, but the sequence has only 0 element(s) (note that indices are 0 based, and ranges are inclusive).
